title: Eleanor Tomlinson wears fitted jumpsuit to Esquire Townhouse launch
text:
She's been trying to crack Hollywood since Poldark came to an end.

And Eleanor Tomlinson was back on her home turf on Wednesday night, putting in a stylish appearance at the Esquire Townhouse launch in Mayfair, London.

The 27-year-old actress looked super chic in a black fitted jumpsuit with a blazer inspired top.

Stylish: Eleanor Tomlinson was back on her home turf on Wednesday night, putting in a stylish appearance at the Esquire Townhouse launch in Mayfair, London

Eleanor's simple yet sophisticated attire was cinched in at the waist with a subtle belt and she completed the look with a pair of simple stilettos.

The redhead styled her hair in loose, natural looking curls and kept her make-up fresh and simple.

She turned heads when she left the venue following a successful evening at the star-studded bash.

Glamorous: The 27-year-old actress looked super chic in a black fitted jumpsuit with a blazer inspired top

Understated: Eleanor's simple yet sophisticated attire was cinched in at the waist with a subtle belt and she completed the look with a pair of simple stilettos

Eleanor's sighting comes after fans of Poldark slammed the BBC1 drama's finale in August.

The series, based on the novels of Winston Graham, focused on the burgeoning relationship between Cornwall gentleman Ross Poldark (Aidan Turner) and his scullery maid turned wife, Demelza (Eleanor Tomlinson).

Over five seasons, it set pulses racing with its love triangles, bedroom romps and upstairs-downstairs affairs.

Natural beauty: The redhead styled her hair in loose, natural looking curls and kept her make-up fresh and simple

But viewers were left disappointed by the final episode, which saw Poldark take on the role of double-agent in order to trick the French, with many commenting on the 'confusing' plot and 'bad' scriptwriting.

One wrote: 'I know I can press the off button, but I've been a fan of #Poldark for 40 years and counting. The awful travesty of this final episode of an indifferent, odd and disconnected series five is like hypnosis.

They added: 'I'm appalled but can't look away. What have they done?'
description: Eleanor Tomlinson was back on her home turf on Wednesday night, putting in a stylish appearance at the Esquire Townhouse launch in Mayfair, London.
